snippet: The Church of England said Friday that gay clergymen in civil partnerships could become bishops as long as they vowed to remain celibate.
abstract: Church of England says gay clergymen in civil partnerships can become bishops as long as they vow to remain celibate.
lead_paragraph: The Church of England said Friday that gay clergymen in civil partnerships could become bishops as long as they vowed to remain celibate.

headline.seo: Anglicans Open a Path to Bishopric for Gay Men
headline.main: Church of England Ends Ban on Gay Men as Bishops
headline.print_headline: Anglicans Open a Path For Gay Men As Bishops

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
